title: Juggernauts build 5.16

replies.body:
You are completly wrong with Morde and Skarner, specially with Skarner...

 I'm Skarner main and I prove a lot of differents builds, and I can say that {{item:3078}} is not efficient anymore, because {{item:3071}} brings the passive "Rage" and the most useful stat on Skarner: CD. So it's a lose of efficient money cost.

Also the Sheen passive continues strong on him, so you can found a good synergy with {{item:3025}} specially with the CD part.

He now needs the juggernauts items because he's a juggernaut now and has more efficient performance with his kit ratios, I notice he performs very well with these two:
 {{item:3742}} and {{item:3053}}.

Like most of his items grants HP, he can maximize the "effectiveness" with {{item:3709}}, also helps him to clear more fastly.

Finally he needs a little bit of tenacity and MR to balance his kit so: {{item:1321}}.

So the final build looks something like this:

{{champion:72}} : {{item:3071}} {{item:3709}} {{item:1321}} {{item:3742}} {{item:3053}} {{item:3025}} 

Obviusly if the enemy team has a hard AP comp add {{item:3102}} instead {{item:3025}} ...



-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

{{champion:82}} depends in how you use it, I prefer in duo bot with:

{{item:3401}} {{item:3071}} {{item:3053}} {{item:3047}} {{item:3116}} {{item:3146}} 

{{item:3078}} can be used instead {{item:3071}} but the mana part doesn't exist so is not "efficient" at all in the money cost department.
Morse is better as a support with insane objective control solo lane morde is going to be pretty bad.

Go Bot Lane APC Morde then, not as a support.

Your mid laner can be an ADC, like Ezreal, Corki or Varus.

Just go support morde will highly not replace an adc bot lane. 
Go {{item:3302}} {{item:2049}} {{item:3190}} {{item:3050}} {{item:3117}} {{item:3116}} {{item:3341}}
wow no spirit visage, trash build :^)))
